items.content_html: Showcasing a lightweight and high-performance frontend framework built entirely with pure TypeScript! Featuring a custom Virtual DOM implementation and a set of reactive hooks, it delivers a React-like development experience—without any external frameworks or libraries, just clean and modular TypeScript code!
items.title: ayoub-essarghini/RobotoJs: Showcasing a lightweight and high-performance frontend framework built entirely with pure TypeScript! Featuring a custom Virtual DOM implementation and a set of reactive hooks, it delivers a React-like development experience—without any external frameworks or libraries, just clean and modular TypeScript code!
